fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka mainnet fork completed successfully last week
Prysm late attestations caused cascading issues; v7.0.0 flag fix, permanent fix coming
Titan relay missing GetPayloadV2 route; MevBoost/CommitBoost fallbacks prevented missed slots

critical_infrastructure.highlight: Blob inclusion near saturation (9 blobs common); mempool elasticity compensates for gaps
Column propagation healthy: all 128 columns seen within ~250ms of first
Breadth-first dispatch optimization recommended for CLs to improve column distribution

testing_progress.highlight: BAL Kurtosis: 13 epochs with 4 clients; Nethermind added debug endpoint
Gas boundary bugs found via EVM fuzzer; tests being added
New workflow for frequent 100M gas test artifact releases

client_updates.highlight: Nethermind redesigning DB to unblock future gas increases
Nethermind plugin for fast historical opcode tracing under testing
testing_period_block RPC endpoint spec drafted; Nethermind and Reth have PoCs

organizational.highlight: ePBS trustless payments decision at ACDC Thursday; Dec 19 last breakout
Decision needed: support staked-only or staked+unstaked builders in ePBS

action_items.action: Release Prysm fix with backfill and publish post-mortem
Release gas boundary tests for self-destruct edge cases
Correlate column data with blob mempool and missed slots
Review testing_period_block RPC spec and provide feedback

decisions.decision: New CFI EIPs will be tested together with Block-level Access Lists
BAL DevNet-1 requires 24hr Kurtosis stability with 3+ clients
